The video clip was published on Facebook: 2021, and shows a crowd chanting as they march along a street.
The crowd can be heard chanting phrases: PM Modi should deal with them with sticks! Delhi police should beat them with sticks! Beat these jihadists with sticks!"
The post: s Hindi-language caption claims that the people in the clip are chanting about Indian farmers and that they are not farmers but violent goons.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify found the same clip published on a YouTube channel for "hello Uttarakhand news" on February 25, 2019, with a title referencing the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) and the National Register of Citizens (NRC).
